Name: Soy (PH)
SeedDescription: Plant these in the fall. Takes 5 days to mature into a soy plant. Continues to produce after their first harvest, with a chance to yield multiple pods.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plant these in the fall. Takes 5 days to mature into a soy plant. Continues to produce after their first harvest, with a chance to yield multiple pods.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ko: Plant these in the fall. Takes 5 days to mature into a soy plant. Continues to produce after their first harvest, with a chance to yield multiple pods.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Pflanze sie im Herbst. Wächst in 5 Tagen heran, kann aber danach mehrmals geerntet werden. Bringt manchmal mehrere Sojabohnen pro Ernte ein.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.fr: Plant these in the fall. Takes 5 days to mature into a soy plant. Continues to produce after their first harvest, with a chance to yield multiple pods.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.hu: Plant these in the fall. Takes 5 days to mature into a soy plant. Continues to produce after their first harvest, with a chance to yield multiple pods.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.it: Plant these in the fall. Takes 5 days to mature into a soy plant. Continues to produce after their first harvest, with a chance to yield multiple pods.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ja: Plant these in the fall. Takes 5 days to mature into a soy plant. Continues to produce after their first harvest, with a chance to yield multiple pods.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plant these in the fall. Takes 5 days to mature into a soy plant. Continues to produce after their first harvest, with a chance to yield multiple pods.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ru: Сажайте осенью. Вырастает через 5 дней и продолжает давать урожай после первого сбора.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.tr: Plant these in the fall. Takes 5 days to mature into a soy plant. Continues to produce after their first harvest, with a chance to yield multiple pods.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 秋天种植。 需要5天的时间成熟成大豆植株。在第一次收获后继续生产，有机会产出多个豆荚。
